entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Fatal exception after adding modal window to navigation stack #20187
  • CarouselView does not honor VisualStates #20186
  • Xcode Instruments Memory Allocations does not work with .NET MAUI projects on iOS #20185
  • ActivityIndicator IsRunning Property Binding doesn't work #20184
  • IBrowser.OpenAsync(<url>, BrowserLaunchMode.External) fails on Android #20182
  • Adding/Removing layout children does not invalidate measures #20181
  • [Windows] Shell TitleColor changes not only the color of the title, but also the color of the secondary ToolbarItem's titles #20177
    Backlog
  • iOS app crashes in release mode on physical device #20175
  • iOS not show splash screen #20171
  • Fix the disabled image tests on WinUI #20168
    Backlog

Closed

  • Strange file picker behavior when using BlazorWebView #15812
  • Physical iPad Air 2 (Software Version 15.8) will not run new MAUI app #19764
  • Add MediaPicker option to pick or capture #20180
  • [UITests] Add features for running tests in better isolation and for handling Multiple Test Cases #16675
    Backlog
  • Issue with File Upload Dialog in WebView Control After Upgrading to .NET 8 on macOS in .NET MAUI #19881
  • After migrating to .NET8, mobile app has issues building on Visual Studio only on Windows #19939
  • .NET 8 iOS app build error when using Xamarin.Firebase.iOS.Core NuGet: bitcode_strip: missing argument(s) #19946
  • GetTypeNameFromCustomNamespace does not cache duplicate results #19944
  • Window.Destroying event not fired when you swipe the app away on Android #20146
  • Windows scroll bar configure to be always visible and always expanded... #20145
  • Android: Keyboard does not close when Entry looses the focus #20170
  • Android App crashes on startup #20176
  • iOS Binding Does Nothing #14775
    Backlog
  • Assigning "{x:Type ImageButton}" instead of "ImageButton" to the TargetType property of a Trigger in an ImageButton style breaks build #18324
    Backlog
  • Animated gifs do not start initially #7019
    Under Consideration
  • `"Uncaught ReferenceError: Blazor is not defined", source: https://0.0.0.0/ `on physical Android device #14961

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Add missing demands #20183
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Android Shell BackButtonBehavior TextOverride #20179
    community ✨
  • Fix Shell.NavBarIsVisible property #20173
    area/Xaml </>, area/shell 🐢
  • utsav9904:#19458 i solve this to gone to the code #20172
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [WinUI] Fix gif animation initial state #20169
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-image, .NET 8 SR3
  • Fixed android toolbar icon change (#19673) #20166
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/toolbar

Merged

  • [Testing] Added appium UITest for FlyoutNavigationBetweenItemsWithNavigationStacks #19444
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Source Generator Performance Improvements #19990
    area/Xaml </>
  • [X] allow x:Type extension for BPConverter #18540
    area/Xaml </>, stale
  • Enable Windows Image device tests #20167
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, Under Consideration

Updated

  • Batch CollectionChanged events via ObservableRangeCollection #20036
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [iOS][NativeAOT] Adding NativeAOT RunOniOS device test #19923
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/testing, .NET 9 Planning
  • Update Template Shell Foreground colour #20152
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Don't remeasure TableView if specs are the same #20130
    area/ListView
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview1] Update versions #20158
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Hide FlyoutIcon when FlyoutBehavior set to disabled #20087
    community ✨
  • Add animated GIF support for Image on iOS #19411
    area/image :framed_picture:, stale, .NET 8 SR3
  • Adding a test to validate loading images #20147
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Add better exception for missing Maps on Windows #19046
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/Maps🗺
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • Fix 19647 #20127
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
    community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Figure a better EstimatedItemSize for HorizontalList #20022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Android Ecosystem updates - AndroidX #17318
    stale, area/platform
  • Added TimePicker TimeSelected Event #18565
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker, stale
  • Add GCs to better validate GC related issue paths #19409
    stale
  • Removes dead code from type conversion #19436
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • use raw string literals #19961
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [Trimming] Allow creating TypedBinding from expressions #19995
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Call RootViewChanged when setting ContentView to null #20052
    area/shell 🐢
  • Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #19048
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • More IndexOf() optimization #20083
    community ✨
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Windows] Add hot reload support for ListView #20144
    platform/windows 🪟, area/ListView, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Reinstate animated GIF on iOS & macOS #17207
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Housekeeping] Enabling ignored tests #20129
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-reenable
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
